attributes.action: Make Boris Johnson King of the Earth or just maybe Prime minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Well, me and a few pals of mine have loved boris johnson for years now he is a good worker make me laugh and has a great tackle on him as we saw in England vs Germany on channel 5 a while back so if your a fan of boris too sign the petition.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
